areas_of_spending.summary: This category encompasses all spending related to educational services provided by the council, including staffing costs for teachers and support staff, educational materials, school maintenance, and administrative support.

subtypes_level_1.summary: This subtype includes costs for teaching staff salaries, educational materials, school facility maintenance, special education needs, and administrative support services.

subtypes_level_2.summary: Provision of early childhood education and childcare services for children under the age of five.
Additional funding allocated directly to schools to reduce the poverty-related attainment gap.
Supports Gaelic language education within the council area.
National program aimed at improving educational outcomes in areas of deprivation.

areas_of_spending.summary: Includes all expenditures related to the well-being of residents requiring assistance due to age, disability, or other factors.

subtypes_level_1.summary: Services for adults and the elderly, including healthcare integration with the West Lothian Integration Joint Board (IJB).
Child protection services, foster care, adoption services, and youth support programs.

areas_of_spending.summary: Covers all costs associated with the provision and maintenance of council housing, including management of housing stock and support services for tenants.

subtypes_level_1.summary: Management and support of housing services, customer service centers, and building maintenance.
Includes repairs and maintenance, supervision and management, depreciation of housing assets, and other housing-related costs.

subtypes_level_2.summary: Routine and emergency repairs to council housing stock.
Administrative costs associated with managing council housing.
Accounting charges reflecting the consumption of housing assets.
Funds set aside to cover potential losses from unpaid rent.
Miscellaneous costs related to housing services.

areas_of_spending.summary: Expenditures related to the upkeep of the local environment and essential operational services.

subtypes_level_1.summary: Includes waste disposal, recycling services, street cleaning, road maintenance, parks and open spaces, and environmental health services.

areas_of_spending.summary: Central administrative functions that support the operations of the council, including executive management and support services.

subtypes_level_1.type_of_spending: Chief Executive, Finance, and Property Services
subtypes_level_1.summary: Corporate management, financial services, property management, legal services, and human resources.
Support services including IT and communications.

areas_of_spending.summary: Various services essential for community support and development.

subtypes_level_1.summary: May include community development projects, economic initiatives, and support for voluntary organizations.

areas_of_spending.summary: Expenditures aimed at planning and facilitating economic growth within the council area.

subtypes_level_1.summary: Urban planning, building control, economic regeneration projects, and support for local businesses.

areas_of_spending.summary: Funding for cultural activities, recreational facilities, and leisure services to enhance the quality of life for residents.

subtypes_level_1.summary: Operation of leisure centers, sports facilities, swimming pools, and recreational programs.

areas_of_spending.summary: Costs associated with the council's trading activities, primarily focusing on property management for economic development.

subtypes_level_1.summary: Management and leasing of industrial units, offices, and shops to support local businesses.

areas_of_spending.summary: Minor expenditures not significant enough to warrant individual categories.

subtypes_level_1.summary: Expenditures to subsidize local bus services.

subtypes_level_1.type_of_spending: Residential Schools and Social Work Payments
subtypes_level_1.summary: Payments for children placed in residential schools and additional social work-related expenditures.
Costs associated with placing children in special schools outside the council area.
Various minor services and expenditures not significant enough for separate categorization.
